MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich affecting properties in Crewe Road, Sandy Lane and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:32am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:22am on 15th October 2020.
